LanguageData.EndGame_Requirements.label: Town charter by martial law
LanguageData.EndGame_Requirements.description:
And if thy survive
The onslaught by a pair of moon,
This will be your price
Ol' civic right in thee harvest soon..

This is the main paragraph on the scroll you've found about winning the right to be a town. It contains the exact requirements for archiving it by martial law. We just need to find a way to decipher it..
